GSD.product_version: versions from v5.2 to before v5.15.56
GSD.description:
ipv4: Fix a data-race around sysctl_fib_sync_mem.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.56 by commit 9be8aac91960ea32fd0e874758c9afee665c57d2, it was introduced in version v5.2 by commit 9ab948a91b2c2abc8e82845c0e61f4b1683e3a4f. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ipv4: Fix a data-race around sysctl_fib_sync_mem.
